body.name: HOROW One Piece Toilet with Gold Button, Space Saving Toilet with Soft Closing Seat, 12'' Rough-In Dual Flush Modern Toilet for Small Bathroom, White Toilet Bowl & Golden Tank Button
features: Gold Button: A timeless, sophisticated and flattering gold-plated top button is included, the flat of gold will bringing out the shimmer of brass and other metal and is perfectly pair with your home's existing classic or contemporary metalic elements

Modern Compact Design: This small toilet measures just 25 inches deep by 13.4 inches wide and 28.4 inches high, ensuring plenty of room for comfort in a small space. Contemporary and one-piece design, exactly what you are looking for. Perfectly suitable for your modern design bathroom.

Easy to Install: Two big installation access on the side allows the plumber to install this dual flush toilet much easier. Package includes toilet, soft closing toilet seat, pre-installed flush valve, high-quality wax ring, floor bolts, and also installation instruction.

Easy To Clean: The modern toilet's fully skirted trapway design makes it extremely easy to clean. It can be kept clean for a longer time because of using self-cleaning materials. Compare to other standard toilets, it has no corners and grooves and is very easy to reach for cleaning, not like others hard to reach.

Space Saver: This toilet is compact one piece toilet in small size smaller and shorter than a standard toilet,so it fits for small bathrooms. Actually, it’s a perfect size unless you’re an extremely large person. It is a wonderful small toilet for water closets.

Suprior Quality Seat: This bathroom toilet adopts a slow cover design, which can better protect the main body and appearance of the toilets, prolong the service life of the toilet, and better reduce the noise of going to the toilet at night. And the high-end soft closing PP Seat with a stainless steel durable hinge, easy to get the toilet seat off to tighten or clean after years of use.

Highly Efficient Dual Flush: HOROW toilet has two flush options and both are water saving features. The full flush uses 1.6 gallons of water, while the light flush uses 1.1 gallons (average flush 1.28gpf), which can save even more water without compromising a clean flush that performs as well as other toilets.

Life-Time After-Sales Service: HOROW values each customer’s shopping experience and believes in the quality of our products, therefore our toilets comes with lifetime after-sales service and 1 year limited warranty. Our customer service center will respond to messages within 12 hours.
Certifications: cUPC,UPC and Water Sense certified. CEC compliant. cUPC certified water flush valve.

Note: This toilet is designed for floor mounting, standard 12” Rough-in. It works for U.S. standard 7/8'' waterline. An adapter for 1/2'' waterline is pre-installed. (The toilet for 10'' Rough-in is also listed, please choose the correct one for your bathroom plumbings)
body.description: HOROW ONE PIECE TOILET with GOLD Flush Button Contemporary and Compact Design A timeless, sophisticated, and flattering gold-plated top button is included, the flat of gold will bringing out the shimmer of brass and other metal and is perfect pair with your home's existing classic or contemporary metallic elements. This small toilet is designed with the highest quality material. The sharply modern form of it is sure to provide the most comfort in any small bathroom. The miniature toilet is install in a powder room or in an additional bathroom where space is limited.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: Purchased two toilets over a year ago and have worked great. They are sleek and modern and save space as we were hoping. Easy installation too. Lid/seat broke in the back where it attaches to the toilet and are being replaced courtesy of the seller. Pleased with customer service and the quick response to resolve the issue. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, compact toilet for small space
reviews.reviewText: My contractor made a mistake in locating the sewer line of the toilet and we didn't catch it until after the porcelain tiles on the floors and the walls were installed. Then we realized that a standard 12" rough-in toilet wouldn't fit in there and I had to find a 10" rough-in. I ordered this beautiful toilet and the seller mistakenly sent me a 12" rough-in first. When I reached out to them, they were very apologetic. They let me keep the 12" toilet and they sent me a new 10" one which arrived in a few days. I was very pleased with the customer service and the quick shipment of the correct size toilet.From the comfort standpoint, the toilet seat is a bit smaller than the toilet itself and it is raised almost half an inch which makes it a bit uncomfortable to sit on. I am planning to change the seat cover to a slightly bigger toilet seat and a more flat one to make it more comfortable. Overall, I am very happy with the toilet, the look of it and my experience with the seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars works well. easy install. seat could be better.
reviews.reviewText: Nice well needed replacement for my toilet. install was easy. Need to buy extra lining though. seat was plastic. seat could be better quality. flushes efficiently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For a non-traditional toilet size it's somewhat of a gamble to order and install it. In this case the product does exactly what it says, is high quality, size is perfect albeit a bit different shape. For the purpose of a smaller footprint this toilet does the job. I recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two-way flush, easy install
reviews.reviewText: So happy I found this toilet. It’s water saving, sturdy and built to fit small spaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good toilet for small area
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this due to its size. My bathroom is small and needed to be remodeled. This was an updated toilet, and fit the area without overtaking prime space. The only problem I had was the toilet seat holders. The little gadgets used to hold the seat in place weren't holding it in place to the extent that it came undone. I emailed the company and they sent replacement holders. It took a few emails back and forth, but finally got it done. That said, it is a nice toilet, they just need to figure out a better way to hold the seat!Update: The company reached out to me several times after. I explained that even with new fittings, the seat still slid around. They've offered me a new seat that's better than the old one. I will update after I receive it. I've given 5 stars because of their outstanding customer service which I've not experienced with any other company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Concerned about the silicone, patches?
reviews.reviewText: The toilet was easy to install. It flushes well.I do wonder about quality control. Seems like silicone in various spots on the under side, hope it doesn’t mean leaks in the future…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleased with purchase
reviews.reviewText: We purchased two of these toilets to replace 60+-year-old "water hogs" in a residence. Our experience so far has been positive. They are nicely designed and work as well as or better than similar products on the market. (i.e., no need to flush 14 times or whatever the heck the U.S. president claimed is the case with modern toilets!) The compact size has been a huge improvement in the smallest bathroom, and the toilet looks nice in the other one, as well. Installation was done by family members who have had experience with this particular home improvement project. Getting the seat installation right took some time -- each toilet had a slightly different seat attachment configuration, and the pictured instructions were a bit difficult to interpret.Possible Concerns: If you like an extended bowl toilet, or a higher seat, measure what you have and compare it to the specs on this before ordering. The compact size works for us but might not for others. The seat lids, like those on similar toilets on the market, do not feel as sturdy as wood or composite lids of the past, and given the unusual shape and attachment design, I don't know how easy they would be to replace, if necessary. Professional plumbers might have reservations about the flush mechanism, in case it is not easily repairable, or in case it is not made with standard components, but we haven't had any problems.
